div.sent: He is our Father.
He has created beautiful things for us.
He has created a beautiful world for us.
He commanded and things were created at once.
He is the Almighty.
That is why He can create anything only by giving orders.
In six days God created everything.
He took rest after He had created all these.
The seventh day was God's day of rest.
On the first day God created the sky.
On the second day He created the light.
After creating them.
He became very delighted.
After that He created many other beautiful things.
Here we will learn what God created on the third and the fourth days.
On the third day God created land and the sea.
He created the land by just giving a command.
So it happened.
God named the land Earth.
In the land He then created different things.
He created grass, vegetables, different plants that bear flowers and fruits.
He endowed plants with seeds.
He also desired seeds to germinate and grow into plants.
We live on the earth created by God.
The water that had come together at one place by God's command was named Sea.
There is a lot of water in rivers, ponds, lakes and pools.
But the main source of water is the sea.
There is a connection between the sea and the other sources of water.
However, God created fishes, crocodiles and many other aquatic animals.
God was pleased with His beautiful creation of the Earth and the Sea.
Thus God completed His third day's creation.
God has created the land and the water that benefit us in many ways.
We live on earth.
We plough the land and grow crops and plant trees.
We play on the land.
Different kinds of animals live on earth.
There are useful to us.
On land we travel in vehicle or on foot.
By digging the earth we get many kinds of minerals.
We cannot live without water and plants or animals cannot live without water either.
We wash things with water.
We swim in water.
In water live many kinds of animals that are useful to us.
For example, fish that we eat.
We use vessels like boats, steamers or ships to travel on water.
We use water for cultivation.
The world as created by God is very big.
The earth is divided into seven parts.
They are Asia, Africa, Europe, North America, South America, Australia and the Antarctic.
These divisions are known as continents.
All the water in the world is divided into five parts.
We call them oceans.
The amount of the water in the world is more than that of the land.
Only one-fourth of it is the land and the remaining three- fourths is the water.
We know God has created light for us.
He has separated darkness from light.
He has named light Day.
He has named darkness Night.
He has created the sun to separate light from darkness.
To us the night is a blessing from God because we take rest at night.
All the creation of God are well-planned.
He gave the earth a round shape.
During the daytime we study, do work, play or go out.
When we get tired, we need rest.
That was why God gave us night.
At night we study or work for some time and then go to sleep.
After the day's work we become tired.
As we sleep we get rid of our tiredness.
Next day we wake up to start our day's work again.
We can see things clearly in the sunlight.
We can dry wet things in the sunlight.
In winter the heat of the sun makes us feel warm.
We can have a sound sleep in the darkness of the night.
Things become very hot because of the heat of the sun.
At night they cool down.
The stillness of night helps us study.
We thank You for Your beautiful creation.
You have filled this earth with fruits and flowers for us.
You have provide us with water to survive.
During daytime we work hard under the sun.
But You have blessed us with night when we take rest.
For all these things we praise You.
God created things round.
The three-fourths of the earth we can talk to God.
God has made the earth on the land.
In the stillness of night is more than that of the land.
We can play consists of water.
The amount of water in the world only by giving orders.
